page.title: 20Local History
page.content:
The Trefriw Community Council is in the process of re-erecting a monument blown down by gales in the late l97Os. It commemorates the life of Taliesin, a famous Welsh bard.He is reputed to have lived in the 6th cent. A.D.near the shores of Llyn Geirionydd,in the mountains above Trefriw.
This information has been compiled by Trefriw Women's Institute and entered on computer by Mrs.E. Mills and Mr. F.Dillien, edited by Mrs.E.James, and Mrs. G.Williams, from contributions by
Mrs. P. Barker, Mrs. C. Cornish, Mrs.E.James, Mrs.E. Mills, Mrs. N. Roberts, Mrs. F. Smith, Mrs.B. Williams, Mrs.G.Williams.
